application_categories.name: Distributed
application_categories.description: Applications that are provided for consumption outside the company.

application_categories.name: Hosted
application_categories.description: Applications that are hosted such as services or software as a service.

application_categories.name: Internal
application_categories.description: Applications that are used only by your employees.

application_categories.name: Company-Confidential
application_categories.description: Contains bespoke company IP and is subject to rigorous policy.

component_labels.label: Architecture-Blacklisted
component_labels.description: Components which have been blacklisted from use

component_labels.label: Architecture-Cleanup
component_labels.description: Components which are relics of a build and should not be included in the distribution

component_labels.label: Architecture-Deprecated
component_labels.description: Components we want to discourage from developer use

component_labels.label: External License
component_labels.description: Denotes a component that is subject to an external commercial license.
